content: decrease insert hook in next st yo and draw up a loop times double_crochet ch1 double_crochet twice yo and draw through all 3 loops on hook row 6 repeat row 4 dc3tog yo insert hook in next st yo and draw up loop yo and draw through 2 loops on hook three times yo and draw through all 4 loops on hook ©2019 all rights reserved pattern not to be resold all projects made using this pattern are intended for personal use only for any other use please contact designer for permission row 7 ch3 double_crochet in first single_crochet double_crochet in next 4 single_crochet decrease three times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1 * double_crochet ch1 three times decrease 6 times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1* double_crochet ch1 three times decrease 4 times double_crochet in last 2 single_crochet row 8 repeat row 4 row 9 ch3 double_crochet in first single_crochet double_crochet in next 6 single_crochet decrease three times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1 * double_crochet ch1 three times decrease 6 times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1* double_crochet ch1 three times decrease 4 times row 10 repeat row 4 row 11 ch1 2 scblo in first single_crochet scblo across sc2togblo in last 2 single_crochet row 12 ch1 sc2togflo scflo across 2 scflo in last single_crochet row 13 repeat row 11 row 14 repeat row 12 row 15 ch3 double_crochet in first single_crochet double_crochet in next 4 single_crochet ch1 double_crochet twice ch1 decrease 6 times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1 * double_crochet ch1 three times decrease 6 times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1* double_crochet ch1 double_crochet dc3tog row 16 repeat row 4 row 17 ch3 double_crochet in first single_crochet double_crochet in next 6 single_crochet ch1 double_crochet twice ch1 decrease 6 times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1 * double_crochet ch1 three times decrease 6 times ch1 double_crochet twice ch1* double_crochet decrease row 18 repeat row 4 repeat row 1-18 - 8 more times then row 1-6 once more or until desired length end on an even row single_crochet border turn ch1 and single_crochet in each single_crochet across row just made ch2 rotate the work 90 degrees and work single_crochet evenly into the long edge 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet 2-3 single_crochet in each double_crochet ch2 rotate the work 90 degrees and work one single_crochet into each fsc/foundation chain across ch2 turn the work 90 degrees and work single_crochet evenly into the edge ch2 and slip_stitch into first single_crochet wet block weave in ends and enjoy as a teenager dorian learned to crochet from her grandma she has become an avid crocheter enthusiastic instructor and sometimes designer originally from alaska she now makes her home in colorado where she enjoys crocheting camping and craft beer you can find her on ravelry as dkowen and instagram as dorianowen
